name: Woocommerce Egypt Citites
author: Mohamed Mounir

sections.description: A short plugin that adds Egypt cities to WooCommerce’s list of states. This can be useful if you’re using some kind of shipping methods that requires cities/states to calculate the shipping fees, using woocommerce shipping calculator.
sections.installation:
Before installing this plugin, make sure you’ve woocommerce plugin already installed and activated.

  1. Upload woocommerce-egypt-cities to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or you can install it directly from wordpress dashboard. Go to Plugins -> Add New -> search for "Woocommerce Egypt Citites" -> Install
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now you’re good to go. If you’re using any plugins that requires States/Cities for shipping calculation, you can go to the plugin settings and check States/Cities dropdown list and you will find all Egypt citites listed there.

short_description: A short plugin that adds Egypt cities to WooCommerce's list of states.
description: A short plugin that adds Egypt cities to WooCommerce’s list of states. This can be useful if you’re using some kind of shipping methods that requires cities/states to calculate the shipping fees, using woocommerce shipping calculator.

screenshots.caption: If you're using a plugin that uses shipping zones to calculate shipping like (WooCommerce Table Rate Shipping) Go to Woocommerce -> Shipping Zones.
Select type of zones based on states or countries.
